item.title: Jeffrey Epstein files: House petition secures final signature to force vote on releasing docs
item.description: The Trump administration has been criticized for failing to release files about convicted sex offender Jeffrey Epstein, a former friend of President T...

item.title: Jeffrey Epstein on Trump: 'I know how dirty donald is'
item.description: President Trump and the DOJ have been criticized for reneging on promises by administration officials to release files about Jeffrey Epstein.

item.title: Supreme Court to hear arguments on Trump bid to fire Fed Gov. Lisa Cook on Jan. 21
item.description: Two lower federal courts have blocked President Trump from removing Lisa Cook as a governor of the Federal Reserve Board.

item.title: House to vote on bill to end shutdown around 7 p.m. ET Wednesday, Rep. Scalise says
item.description: The House will vote early Wednesday evening to end the longest government shutdown in history, the majority leader said.

item.title: The sharks are circling UK PM Keir Starmer as crunch points loom
item.description: The Autumn Budget on Nov. 26 could prove pivotal, or politically fatal, for the PM.
